moover:deploy.description: Launches a Moover relational data deployment for a scratch org.
examples:
$ sfdx moover:deploy -u FixesScratchOrg -v MainDevHub
  Command output... deploying from the dev hub, the control org, to the scratch org.
  Command output...

$ sfdx moover:deploy --targetusername test-utxac7gbati9@example.com --targetdevhubusername jsmith@acme.com 
  Command output... deploying from the dev hub, the control org, to the scratch org. Long param names.

$ sfdx moover:deploy -u test-utxac7gbati9@example.com -v jsmith@acme.com -d "UAT Sandbox Connection"
  Command output... deploying from the scratch org to the UAT sandbox, using the named connection record in the dev hub, control org.

$ sfdx moover:deploy --targetusername test-utxac7gbati9@example.com --targetdevhubusername jsmith@acme.com --source "UAT Sandbox Connection"
  Command output... deploying to the scratch org from the UAT sandbox, using the named connection record in the dev hub, control org. Long param names.

loglevel.name: loglevel
loglevel.description: logging level for this command invocation

targetusername.name: targetusername
targetusername.description: username or alias for the target org; overrides default target org

targetdevhubusername.name: targetdevhubusername
targetdevhubusername.description: username or alias for the dev hub org; overrides default dev hub org

apiversion.name: apiversion
apiversion.description: override the api version used for api requests made by this command

source.name: source
source.description: source connection name or record id

destination.name: destination
destination.description: destination connection name or record id

dataset.name: dataset
dataset.description: data set to deploy name or record id

plan.name: plan
plan.description: deployment plan to deploy name or record id
